choices.text:
Python program
Write a function named capital_indexes. The function takes a single parameter, which is a string. Your function should return a list of all the indexes in the string that have capital letters
```python3

def getCapitalIndexes(string):    #define your method here...  
        pass                                                          ##write code for this problem below, then run it to see what happens.   You can also look at other examples of tests in the test folder!     Your function should take a single parameter and return an array containing all index values that have been found with one or more letters being their first character
```

### Example:  Capital_indexes('Python') returns [0, 1] because 'P' is its own initial.
